job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Computer Vision
job.description: pBased in Austin Texas our client is a rapidlygrowing consulting firm that specializes in Artificial Intelligence strategy and custom product development Their goal is to help companies come up with custom solutions and optimize their use of AI They believe in a practical approach where they can apply their techniques creatively on new cases and provide consistent results They work with customers ranging from bigbox companies to tech startups and are looking to disrupt the tech markets with exceptional products and revolutionary business models Our client wants AI to be a more accessible tool for everyone Their mission  Democratize AIppbrppTo support a rapidly a expanding pipeline of cool project for a growing client base they are looking for a strongSenior Machine Learning Engineerstrong who can oversee the complete lifecycle of their products from ensuring project delivery and quality to client managementppbrppstrongWhat you will get to do as a Machine Learning Engineerstrongpulliyou will sit at the cuttingedge of machine learning and software engineering liliYou will be responsible for designing and developing AI and machine learning applications for our growing client base liliYou will join a team of experienced engineers and entrepreneurs bringing practical AI solutions to the market Your responsibilities will include liliDesigning and developing machine learning models liliRunning machine learning tests and experiments liliEvaluating new techniques and making technical recommendations liliRunning numerous experiments in a fastpaced and fun environment liliMentoring junior machine learning engineers to improve their technical skills liulpbrppstrongCore Requirements for a Machine Learning EngineerstrongpulliBS Masters or PhD in Computer Science or equivalent work experience lili3 years of industry experience in machine learning or related field liliProgramming experience with Python Java or C and other leadingedge languagesliliYou should have strong programming skills and professional experience in one or more of the following areasliliAI and Machine Learning liliComputer Vision liliNatural Language Processing liliHardworking with a proven ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines liliExcellent interpersonal skills and ability to get along with engineers at all levels liliYou should take ownership over the things you build and be eager to learn new skills liliAny type of security clearance  liulpbrppstrongWhats in it for you as a Machine Learning EngineerstrongpulliGreat compensation plan includes salary plus comprehensive benefitsliliExperience working on a variety of leadingedge projects in a variety of industries and for a variety of local Austin clients liliWork side by side with brilliant engineers applying AI to realworld problems liliGet access to a variety of health care options provides by recruitAbilityai liliWe are committed to building an inclusive culture thats professional and hardworking thats also fun collaborative and openliulpp
